channel.title: GWD Rework, Challenges, Quests, Al Kharid Gfx, and 'Bot'any Bay! [September BTS]
channel.description:
http://services.runescape.com/m=news/behind-the-scenes-september
My thoughts:
GWD Rework - Should be incredible from what I've seen. I love that they are adding in the new armor before the beta goes live so that the items have a while to settle down. I haven't heard of the new crossbow so I'm interested in that, and hopefully the magic armor is nice (maybe something between infinity robes and virtus?) I hope the item graphic rework is up to standards too, as a virtus owner :P
Challenge System - Should be fun, as long as the bonus XP isnt TOO much.
New Quests - Yay a FTP update too! Don't know much about the quests, but I hope they are cool :P
Al Kharid graphic rework - Just from the screenshots I've seen, it looks really nice. I hope they get around to other cities too!
Botany Bay - Sounds really fun honestly, I can't wait to see it for myself :P

item.title: GWD Rework, Challenges, Quests, Al Kharid Gfx, and 'Bot'any Bay! [September BTS]

item.title: GWD Rework, Challenges, Quests, Al Kharid Gfx, and 'Bot'any Bay! [September BTS]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:30, topic:457813”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=560738.msg4095322#msg4095322 date=1346781758]

[quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=560738.msg4095318#msg4095318 date=1346781591]
The X-bow is Saradomin, I thought this was already confirmed?
[/quote]Yea it is, not sure why I said Armadyl…
[/quote]I still can’t help but feel the crossbow is secretly a fish.[/quote]

A giant Seagull that can scoop players up in their mouth. How cool would that be? I think I just found an end-game Raid Boss idea.

Read full topic

item.title: GWD Rework, Challenges, Quests, Al Kharid Gfx, and 'Bot'any Bay! [September BTS]
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:1, topic:458044”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=560738.msg4093221#msg4093221 date=1346604549]
They made it to further down on bots. It’s a public opinion thing. Something like this massively dissuades newer botters from continuing botting.
[/quote]“newer” botters is just a bad term. In reality very few are new botters. Most of the time they hare old vets in the botting scene.[/quote]

Considering some modern bots have followings of tens of thousands, I doubt they are all veterans. Especially since I was around only six years ago and I recognize almost no one nowadays.

Read full topic

item.title: GWD Rework, Challenges, Quests, Al Kharid Gfx, and 'Bot'any Bay! [September BTS]
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

I swear, am I the only who thinks “botany bay” will be completely a waste of time?

If they can detect bots, they should just get an instant ban anyway, why make useless shit for the players… We don’t want to fuck with bots, we just want them out the game.

“Choose their punishment” between what? Perm ban and…? Because that’s all a fucking bot deserves. Not a mute or any other punishment.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:14, topic:457813”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=560738.msg4092912#msg4092912 date=1346556936]
Thing is there is a sticky in the suggestions forum (at least there was last time I checked) about it, with thousands of supporters (which is a lot for the forums). I’m not sure if Jagex has replied to it or not, but I think it would be awesome!
[/quote]
Micro transaction gold mine: to fight spam and Chinese sellers mass sending emails they will charge money for each letter sent.[/quote]Or limit it to your friends list, the same way the ‘friends’ option of private messages goes?

Read full topic

item.title: GWD Rework, Challenges, Quests, Al Kharid Gfx, and 'Bot'any Bay! [September BTS]
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

MAILBOXES.

I’ve been dying for a mailbox update since I think the second week I’ve played Runescape. So yeah, after waiting 5 years, I think now would be a better time than ever to spam the suggestions forum with it.

Read full topic
item.source: GWD Rework, Challenges, Quests, Al Kharid Gfx, and 'Bot'any Bay! [September BTS]

item.title: GWD Rework, Challenges, Quests, Al Kharid Gfx, and 'Bot'any Bay! [September BTS]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:9, topic:457813”]Looks like I can cross Dailies off the list… If they create Mailboxes next I will be very unhappy. We could still do Quest Scaling at least if we decide to revert back to it. Are these daily activities or Quests?[/quote]Daily activities, meaning it will tell you to get X farming xp or do something and if you do it you get a little bonus xp. Just some motivation to do stuff

And what’s wrong with mailboxes? I think having some sort of offline message system would actually be great for RuneScape. It’s one thing it really lacks right now. Whether they do it with the postal system or some other method, I think it’s important.

Read full topic
item.source: GWD Rework, Challenges, Quests, Al Kharid Gfx, and 'Bot'any Bay! [September BTS]
